name: Need for Speed Game Data Archive
summary: An LZC file is a game data archive packed with zlib compression and used by various Need for Speed video games. It may store different types of game data (indicated by the filename), but typically stores vehicle data files that contain 3D models, textures, and meshes.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Electronic Arts Need for Speed: Underground
Electronic Arts Need for Speed: Underground 2
Electronic Arts Need for Speed: Most Wanted
